extendedInfo.description: Here comes the best original, arcade style, fast running game!Enemies are intruding our homeland. You are the ONE with great skills, including, double jump, ninja star, stone skin and Qi.Your mission is to run as far as possible and kill as many enemies as possible to achieve highscore. When you accomplish the tasks, your level goes up.# Kill enemies to collect Qi, and to become super ninja.# Kill enemies by ninja star to get extra bonus.# Achieve tasks to level up.# Submit your score to challenge other players.If you loved arcade games, and would like to challenge your fingers, you should not miss this game!

reviews.title: Stoneskin bug
reviews.comment: Cannot progress past level 24 no matter how many ninjas I kill with stoneskin. I would rate it 5 stars if it wasn\'t for this bug. Very fun game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok game
reviews.comment: Wish it would let me get past level 14 smh I got the stoneskin kills
reviews.author: Ricko Suave

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s cool and simple it\'s a good game it\'s a really good game when you have nothing to do  and when your relaxed

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Fun to play, can\'t stop when you get the hang of it

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: One of my favorite android games! Very fast! Skill is required! Uts a little repetative though.   number 50 of all time ^^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best ninja game I have seen
reviews.comment: I recommand this game for arcade game lovers.U can select ur profile,it has global list of highscores,objectives,trophies.The controls are good.This game is just nice.
reviews.author: Daniel Avedikian

reviews.title: Very Nice Game!
reviews.comment: I have spent many hours  over the last couple years or however long playing this game and have made lots of progress. I am very close to level 31 but the 8,000 meters without getting hurt task proves tedious xD. I do like how the music and visuals compliment the gameplay and I consider it a worthwhile and challenging fun game for my phone! =D <3 this just in. I finally beat the 8,000 meters without hurt task! It took me quite a while but victory is mine at last! Glad I am keeping my eyes open, moving onward
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boom
reviews.comment: This game is so addicting, that your mind will, be constantly, and consistently, be on your mind about the game!?!?  - JJDInYourFace
